transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ah, ye Amritanjali Ayurved Private Limited se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan ji, sir main Priti Rathore baat kar rahi hoon.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Priti Rathore baat kar rahi hoon IndiaMART head office se, Ritik Swami ji, kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Badhiya.
Executive: Achcha, actually maine call kiya tha aapka kal ek concern aaya tha regarding rating ko lekar ke kisi buyer ne kuch bola tha and he has given you wrong rating over there, right?
Hmm hmm.
Executive: To isme sir maine na Saloni ko bola tha ki ek bar aage jo hai buyer supplier team jo hamari ye dekhti hai, matlab sare hi concern dekhti hai ek sath aur rating wala bhi, to unse ek bar baat karne ke liye and jahan pe unhone kaha tha ki we need some sort of proof to remove the rating, jahan pe ya to koi call recording ho aap share kar do ya fir koi conversation ho jahan pe buyer ne ye matlab aapko deliberately bola hai ki mere ko matlab I will give you this and so I need for anything, for any changes, maine wo mana nahi kiya tha but for that hame bhi aage jo hai matlab aage validate karne ke liye kuch chije chahiye hoti hai. To wo mujhe aap ek bar idhar provide kara do aur fir main wo rating ke liye aage baat kar leti hoon agar wo nahi hai sir to uske liye to fir hum bhi bound hai kyunki wo changes na hamare end se nahi hote, matlab hame bhi aage hi bhejna padta hai sir. To agar mere hath me hota to definitely main kar ke de deti kyunki mere liye aap mere customer ho aur mere liye aap sari chije value karte ho. But few things which is not in our hand hame wo aage hi bhejni padti hai aur wahan pe sari chije har customer ke liye protocol same rehte hain. To aapko agar koi document hai matlab any sort of conversation jahan pe usne bola hai aapko deliberately ki hame main aapki rating hi kharab kar dunga to aisi communication hogi aap aage usse baat karte ho to wo communication aati hai. Aap mujhe wo dijiye ek bar wo validate karke aur fir usko hata denge. Maine deny nahi kar paya tha. Maine bola tha ki ek bar ye le lo aur uske baad me main unko aage bhej deti hoon. To wo nahi hai to fir usme to fir main bhi bound ho jati hoon sir, matlab I cannot even do anything from there. Mere end se hatane ka hota main immediately within five minutes hata kar ke bol deti ki sir maine hata diya hai. To aur maine Saloni ko ye bhi bola tha ki you can do one thing, unko bolo ki ek rating se aap aur panch chhe rating kyunki market hai, matlab marketplace hai to wahan pe kya hai ki har tarike ki rating aa sakti hai like any customer jahan pe matchmaking ho rahi hai rating aa sakti hai jahan pe koi panch bhi dega, char bhi dega, we do not have any control on that. To aap jo panch rating ke liye aap thoda sa precise karo rest of the customer ki jahan pe aap apni rating thik kara sakte ho kyunki kisi bhi marketplace pe aap Amazon kholte ho, kahin pe Mitra kholte ho to wahan pe kisi bhi supplier ko aap dekhte ho rating rating mix hi hoti hai. To achchi bhi hogi ek do kharab bhi hogi to isse buyer ko khud hi samajh me aa jata hai ki haan rating to thik hai matlab even I can understand.
Customer: I am not concerned about the rating at all, one thing. I am concerned about how valued I am, take care. A person who is abusing me, one of the things. Second he is blackmailing me, okay.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Third thing he doesn't know what to speak and when to speak. Thik hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Literally keh raha hoon agar ye aadmi mere Udaipur ke axis ke andar hota na main ghar ke nikal ke pehle to marta isse. Literally keh raha hoon.
Executive: Kisko bol rahe hain sir? Kisko?
Customer: Usko us aadmi ko jisne badtameezi ki na. Thik hai.
Executive: Buyer ko bol rahe hain na aap?
Customer: Haan wo buyer ko. Main kya hai I do not understand sir dekho main aapko bol rahi hoon maine deny nahi kiya maine aapki baat suni aur rakhi bhi maine isiliye aage unko escalate bhi kiya but mere ko kuch evidences collect karne hai na wo team ko bol diya hai maine. Thik hai ab wo karenge wo aapko bhej denge. Mera concern yahi tha ki ye aadmi ye kitna confidence se bol raha hai ki main 20 aur jagah se ratings kar dunga aapke liye. That I can understand sir dekho database hota hai na usme.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Tabhi maine aapke liye is concern ko raise kiya.
Customer: Isme aisa hota hai dekho isme hum bhi 15 bar kar sakte hain.
Executive: That is concern raise my eyebrows ki is aadmi ki mentality kitni gandi hai. Thik hai isme gaali bhi de raha hai uske upar ye keh bhi raha hai ki main tumhara aur kharab kar sakta hoon. That have that raise put me on the complaint board thik hai kyunki isse pehle bhi negative reviews aaye hue hain.
Executive: Main aapko ye bolungi ki haan mujhe pata hai sir maine maine profile dekha hua hai aur aapke profile pe last deal jo hai wo Rishabh ne mere se hi baat karke karwai thi to maine yahi bola ki sir mere liye meri priority aap ho agar ye access mere paas me hota ki mujhe karna hota to shayad without a second thought main immediately kar deti.
Customer: Bol diya team ko bol diya hai.
Executive: Team ko bol diya hai they will not talk to jaise jaise bologe waise waise wo itna smart sab hota hai wo to ek do din baad jab baat hogi na wapas randomly hamari backend team call kar rahi hai call back kya hua tha kya negative review tha kyun hua thik hai fir usko thoda sa karke fir hum usko record kar sakte hain thik hai na.
Customer: Aap bilkul bilkul sir mera number na aap save kar lijiye aap mujhe bas ek recording ya any proof jahan pe hai wo ek bar de dijiye maine kal mail bhi matlab maine hi bheja tha wo kal ki mujhe bas itna chahiye ki aap mujhe koi rating sorry call ka recording ya fir mere ko koi bhi aap conversation ka wo de dijiye taki main mera point strong karke wo third party jo hai third team jo hai unse ek bar baat kar paun ki ye raha proof aap isko hataiye.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Wo pura complete access mere paas hath me hai hi nahi sir to wahan pe main kuch bhi nahi kar pa rahi hoon. Aapki baat sunungi aapki baat aage rakhungi aapko favor kar sakti hoon but us favor ke liye bhi I also need some sort of document ki uske bina process ho hi nahi pata hai sir. Kal ye baat samajh li thi thik hai bol bhi diya hai team ko but kya hai ki hamari bhi priority selling hoti hai na madam business first.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai ab in pachdo me pad jayenge to business kab karenge?
Executive: Nahi main aapko bata rahi hoon sir actually kya hai ki dekho maine kal concern isliye close bhi nahi kiya tha maine Saloni ko bola ki ek bar main khud baat karungi aaj subah I was in meeting to mujhe abhi time mila maine bola main khud hi unse baat karungi kyunki wahi hai ki sir deal maine ki hai to koi bhi chij ya dikkat aapko aati hai uske liye meri bhi responsibility ki main aapko ek bar baat karun. To wo chije aapko address hona jaruri nahi ki haan hum efforts karte hain but some things which is not in our hand to wahan pe hum bhi bound ho jate hain. To hame wo document chahiye hi chahiye just to validate kyunki wo team ke liye to har customer ka matlab protocol same hi hai unke protocol yahi hai agar aisa kuch hai to share the document.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Padenenge hai na mere liye aap meri priority ho but mere liye koi dusra customer jo meri bucket me nahi hai wo priority hai nahi wahan pe main bhi protocols hi follow karti hoon. To aap aapke liye bas itna main bolungi ki aap documents mujhe ek bar koi bhi hai bhej dena main aage usko process kara dungi aur wo concern ko fir main ek bar close karungi aur kuch rahega to aap save kar lijiye mera number aur mujhe aap isi number pe bhej dena. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai chaliye okay.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai alright sir thank you so much have a nice day take care.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a wrong rating from a buyer.

- Customer was abused and blackmailed by buyer.

- Wants action against the buyer.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Explained the process for removing the rating.

- Asked for call recording or conversation proof.

- Explained the limitations due to company protocol.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide call recording or conversation proof.



Alert (If Any):

abuse, blackmail

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- rating, abuse, blackmail, protocol, documents
